mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cultural ( title, lecture_start, lecture_end, registration_start, registration_end, target, lecture_time, lecture_place, lecture_day, lecture_name, cost, lecture_text, image_path, write_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{lectureStart}, #{lectureEnd}, #{registrationStart}, #{registrationEnd}, #{target}, #{lectureTime} , #{lecturePlace} , #{lectureDay} , #{lectureName} , #{cost} , #{lectureText}, #{imagePath}, #{writeDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT cul_id, title, lecture_start, lecture_end, registration_start, registration_end, target, image_path, count FROM ( SELECT CCC.*, ROWNUM() as rn FROM ( SELECT cul_id, title, lecture_start, lecture_end, registration_start, registration_end, target, image_path, count FROM cultural WHERE registration_end >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
ORDER BY cul_id DESC ) CCC ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT cul_id, title, lecture_start, lecture_end, registration_start, registration_end, target, image_path, count FROM ( SELECT CCC.*, ROWNUM() as rn FROM ( SELECT cul_id, title, lecture_start, lecture_end, registration_start, registration_end, target, image_path, count FROM cultural WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) > registration_end ORDER BY cul_id DESC ) CCC ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cultural WHERE registration_end >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
